ygData.subject: Re: Re: Undead drops in Kithicor
ygData.msgSnippet: ... But the point is, I don t have to attack them, they attack me. If they ignored me that would be fine, but if I have to spend the time and energy to kill
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, Nov 02/99, "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...> wrote:
> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
> I can sympathize with you on the fighting issues, but you seem to be a
> reasonable player. I doubt you go around killing things that are 32 levels
> below you just to see what they drop.

But the point is, I don't have to attack them, they attack me. If they
ignored me that would be fine, but if I have to spend the time and
energy to kill them the corpses better not poof.


--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
